ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Studying, speaking, reading comprehension, understanding spoken and written Italian.

I have a deeper and more comprehensible understanding of the Italian language and culture. I can now speak, read, and write Italian decently which I was unable to do before this class. I also learned alot about the Italian culture in general and its impact on the world. I also realized that I truly appreciate and enjoy Italian.
Continue my knowledge for Italian learning new vocabulary and tenses and grammar
Learned to speak better, learned more vocab and grammar

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The course did a great job of engaging me and teaching me Italian. A little more organization in class could help, however.

The course is primarily strengths. I truly enjoyed the structure of the course, especially with asynchronous Fridays. I think the mix allowed me to better understand Italian and apply it on my own in a pratical setting. I truly think this is a great course and doesn't really need any improvements.
Good format of 4 days in class and 1 asynchronous
I thought it was a really good course, especially with the asynchronous format. No real suggestions

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I would. It is a really enjoyable class that will also do a great job of teaching Italian.
Yes  Anna is an especially great and fair instructor. Immersion is helpful for learning.

I would highly recommend this course because the instructors and the department is incredibly insightful and helpful for all students. This course is amazing and I absolutely enjoyed learning the language.
Definitely, its a great language and a well-taught subject
Absolutely! Especially if you take it with Anna, she is extremely helpful and actively tries to get you to improve in the class!
